sentences.sContent: Achromatic: Without color. Black, white and gray are achromatic, but called colors by artist.
sentences.sContent_eng: Achromatic: Without color. Black, white and gray are achromatic, but called colors by artist.
sentences.sCn: 无色：没有色彩。黑色，白色和灰色是无色的，但美术家却称之为颜色。

sentences.sContent: CCR : Short for Complementary Colour Removal. A method of achromatic separations by Hell Company.
sentences.sContent_eng: CCR : Short for Complementary Colour Removal. A method of achromatic separations by Hell Company.
sentences.sCn: 是英文字义“除去补色”的简称。是“海尔”公司所用的一种消色分色法。

synos.tran: [光]消色差的；非染色质的；非彩色的

remMethod.val: a (无) + chrom (颜色) + atic → 无色的 → 非彩色的

words.tran: 消色差；[光] 消色差性
